name: Bouncing Bill
overview: A basket of plums needs rescuing. You must help Bouncing BIll get tot he top of the screen to save these damsons in distress. To reach the top he has to negotiate a series of walls. You scor 5 points if he jumps up a level, and lose 10 if he falls. You score a 20 point bonus for catching the balloon which drifts past occasionally, and a 25 point bonus for reachning the top and rescuing a plum. Rescuing a plum is done by jumping up and touching the basket at the top of the screen.
